dimensions:
Overall: 10 7/16 x 8 11/16 in. (26.5 x 22 cm)
circumference: 13 in. (33 cm)
rim: 4 3/4 in. (12 cm)
title: Flagon
inscriptions: engraved on lid in German (translated): Presented to: the Church at Groitzschen by Christian Friedrich Freiesleben, Government-attorney at Bera and director of Justice at Nauendorff Anno 1743; stamped on handle: [artist's seal]
